title: New twists in FTX exploit saga as hacker resurfaces
description: The unknown individual responsible for last year’s exploit of cryptocurrency exchange FTX has resurfaced, moving 2,500 Ether—valued at approximately $4 million—across multiple transactions for the first time. The maneuver comes nearly a year after the cyberattack, which saw a substantial loss of $600 million in tokens. Moreover, the renewed activity in the exploiter’s wallet, which ... Read more
